item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Unusual Uses For Olive Oil
item.description: This paper reviews unusual uses for olive oil throughout the Mediterranean world. Published in the Journal of Oleic Science, 2013.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.

item.title: Han Feilin
item.description: Master’s Supervisor in Digital Film Technology and Generative AI in Film Production. Address: No.4, Xitucheng Road, Haidian District, Beijing, China Email: hanfeilin at bfa.edu.cn I am looking for students (25Fall Master @BFA) and mentee (research oriented), who are self-motivated and highly interested in film production, with a background in computer science, digital media, or related major. Please contact me with CV and portfolio. News!!! 2024/07/16 One paper was accepted in ACM MM 2024!
